strings.Value: "You don't look well. Go get some rest."
"Get out of here immediately! I can't afford to have you infecting our guests!"
"How about we play a prank on our guests? I want you to sneeze on those pompous Aldori over there!"
{n}The servant doesn't look well â€” his eyes are bloodshot and his cheeks are flushed. As soon as he notices your attention, he straightens himself and gives you a strained smile.{/n}
"Oh, it's nothing, Your Grace! Just a bit of a cold I caught on the way here, that's all. It'll pass soon, don't worry!"
"My thanks, Your Grace! You're too kind."
"Of course, Your Grace! I'm so sorry! I'll leave immediately!"
{n}The servant forces a smile.{/n} "As you wish, Your Grace. I'll do my best!"
"Are you sure? You look quite unwell."
"Worry not, sir. Just pray for me, and I'll weather it. We're hardy folk here, you know!"
"Yes... Even here, at a celebration of life, there is someone to remind us all of the inevitable..."
"Heh heh, I'd love to see the looks on their faces! I hope the poor fellow gets well soon, though."
